review: I've spent tens of thousands of dollars on Amazon purchases over my years as a Prime customer.And though I'm ashamed to admit as much as I rely on Amazon reviews, I've never left a review; I guess I never liked the idea of being an unpaid spokesman for someone else's product.After a few weeks with the Fire TV Stick, I'm happy to write my first review. We -- the whole family -- LOVE it. It's intuitive, and easy for everyone to use. My seven-year-old son loves it. Our Mac Mini (which is hooked up to our TV as a Media Center) has been sitting unused since we started using the Fire TV Stick. The only thing that the Fire TV Stick doesn't do better than the Mac Mini is HBO. If HBO came out with an app for Fire TV, I think we might never use the Mac Mini again It has gone well beyond our expectations. Excellent job to the Amazon team behind the hardware and software; you've really done a great job!
author: Tres
